entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
